name: Thug
description: A medium humanoid often on the front lines of crime, equipped with brass knuckles for melee combat and a heavy crossbow for ranged attacks. Typically found wearing leather armor.
memorable: Thugs excel in the use of brute force and intimidation, with abilities that allow them to incapacitate foes in battle.
goals: To overpower and intimidate opponents, serving crime lords or mercenary groups.
relations: Often works alongside other Thugs or brutish allies in criminal enterprises.
environment: Typically found in the underbelly of cities or as part of raiding parties.
strengths: High melee damage output, strong intimidation skills, and ability to incapacitate foes.
weaknesses: Limited versatility outside of combat and vulnerable to ranged attacks.
attacks: Uses multiattack with brass knuckles for increased damage potential and has a heavy crossbow for ranged options.
most_powerful_ability: Brutal ability allows melee attacks to deal an extra die of damage, significantly enhancing threat level.
skills: Possesses proficiency in intimidation, aiding in coercive social interactions.
additional_information: Uses multiattack to enhance damage output.
Often engages in close combat to utilize brute strength.
Advantage on attack rolls against foes if allies are nearby.
Employs tactical maneuvering with abilities like Sucker Punch.
Less effective when isolated from allies.
test_queries: mercenary with high damage melee attacks
